name: Candlekeeper
description:
Developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Greetings Candlekeeper! It is your task to make sure all the candles stay lit, and prevent the shadow dragonlings from turning the world into darkness. Breathe fire on your foes, or on a candle to light it back up. Whenever the gods roll a new dice, that dice becomes part of the map, and your area to protect becomes larger.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Movement

Mouse click - Breathe fire

Escape - Quit to menu
